attributes.action: Introduce free car parking at hospitals as in Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can these charges be justified. Some patients, and remember these people are ill,can not afford these extortionate fees. This practice has ceased in Scotland. England must follow this example.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
